title: Jhin Deadeye theory
body:
all orphans
all had siblings/parentals/gangs(all have second family)


BREAKTHROUGH:
ALL SHOT THROUGH POWER PLAYS (SOURCES OF POWER OR THE THREAT OF CHAMP)
all have been meta picks since release. could deadeye be a jealous summoner


they have all had a life changing moment
they are all famous: vi with the workers, zed destroying a sacred order,
sona playing unusual instruments and being told of all over runeterra which drew the lady who adopted her to the orphanage
and garen who became demacia`s most revered fighter.

`Deadeye` likes to show off his skill by pinpointing the power sources of his foes.
like he is finding their VITALS. like a certain champion we know called FIORA.
he is literally the marksman version of fiora. maybe a long lost brother to fiora who took up the long ranged
approach other that the CQC (close quarters combat) approach.
as of the 2nd of January 2016 we will know this.
if Vi has been shot through the hands of the hextech pack on her back, then this theory is basically confirmed.
this theory says that deadeye is a marksman with insane skill who likes to show off and is deadly while doing so.

theory developed by ArcaniteAlx (OCE) and SpudLiteYear (OCE)

replies.body: give it tracks like blitz alt skin
Garen could've actually shot through the heart as its his strength "my heart for damecia"
